metadata.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Laezel during Tiefling Celebration

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.text: Soon. When you rest, I will come.

45.speaker: Lae'zel
45.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

57.speaker: Lae'zel
57.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

59.speaker: Lae'zel
59.text: To think you might have known paradise.

44.speaker: Lae'zel
44.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Yes. I want your body, and I want it tonight.

63.speaker: Lae'zel
63.text: I have seen the kith'raki tear a screaming neogi's legs from its belly to fashion into blades.

97.speaker: Lae'zel
97.text: Yet they could not match your nerve today. It was enough to drive me to madness.
97.context: NodeContext: She takes a shuddering breath at the end.

19.speaker: Lae'zel
19.text: I smell their blood on you still. I smell your moisture.

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: A glorious reward for a glorious battle.

78.speaker: Lae'zel
78.text: Go on, have your fun. And do not wipe away a single bead of sweat. It's intoxicating.

103.speaker: Lae'zel
103.text: How torturous for us both that I'll never get a taste.

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.text: I smell their blood on you still. I'd have liked to have tasted it.

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.text: Too bad for us both your bunk will be quite busy. Take all the pleasures you can, before dawn brings their end.

77.speaker: Lae'zel
77.text: I smell their blood on you still. I smell your sweat.

106.speaker: Lae'zel
106.text: You know the fortune of my company.
106.context: NodeContext: Said with a bit of a sigh, but not too meanly. She does not like rejection but this is still a more intimate scene

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: Another fortune yet stands before you. A warrior's flesh, rarely tasted.

54.speaker: Lae'zel
54.text: Bah - think if you must. The chance will pass come light of day.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Yes. I will share my bed with you tonight.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Given our history, I can't believe you're asking. And I can't believe I'm saying 'yes'...

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

90.speaker: Lae'zel
90.text: When you lie down for the night, I will come.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.text: And I will take what is mine.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I'd love to share my bed with you tonight.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: I'd love nothing more, but I'm afraid I can't touch anyone until my engine is fixed.

76.speaker: Lae'zel
76.text: A loathsome hurdle. Watching you burn lit a fire in me I could not quench alone.

93.speaker: Lae'zel
93.text: I will have to seek relief elsewhere.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: A night such as this calls for flesh to feast on. And I have chosen the sweetest.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: Sorry, but I'm not interested in you like that.

6.speaker: Lae'zel
6.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me. Wyll looks particularly tempting tonight.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: I will not go long without pleasure.

73.speaker: Lae'zel
73.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me. Gale looks particularly tempting tonight.

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me. Astarion looks particularly tempting tonight.

92.speaker: Lae'zel
92.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me.

10.speaker: Lae'zel
10.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to Astarion.

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: I hope for your sake he doesn't come too near your neck.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Perhaps we could get to know each other another time.

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish. Wyll looks particularly tempting tonight.

86.speaker: Lae'zel
86.text: One day, fortune may favour you.

29.speaker: Lae'zel
29.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish. Gale looks particularly tempting tonight.

100.speaker: Lae'zel
100.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish. Astarion looks particularly tempting tonight.

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: You might still persuade me to share the night with you instead.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: I will do no such thing - not when you have turned your back on me so often.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I don't appreciate the snide tone. I'm happy with my choice.

40.speaker: Lae'zel
40.text: But come morning, you will wonder.

99.speaker: Lae'zel
99.text: You will wonder how my lips might have tasted, how my fingers on your skin might have felt.

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself. Wyll looks particularly tempting.

22.speaker: Lae'zel
22.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself. Gale looks particularly tempting.

62.speaker: Lae'zel
62.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself. Astarion looks particularly tempting.

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I'm grateful for your aid. You really are a gifted warrior.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: Vlaakith demands of me no less.

85.speaker: Lae'zel
85.text: Mm - if only I might lay claim to my proper trophy.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to Gale.

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: I've no doubt he's as seductive as he is succinct.

53.speaker: Lae'zel
53.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to the tiefling.

58.speaker: Lae'zel
58.text: I've no doubt she will satisfy your tastes for the mundane.

33.speaker: Lae'zel
33.text: A pity for us you have promised your night to the half-elf.

15.speaker: Lae'zel
15.text: I've no doubt she will satisfy your tastes for endless conversation.

36.speaker: Lae'zel
36.text: A pity for us you have promised your night to Gale.

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: I've no doubt he will satisfy your tastes for endless conversation.

101.speaker: Lae'zel
101.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to the Blade.

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.text: I've no doubt he will satisfy your tastes for the mundane.

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: A pity for us both you have promised yourself to another.

82.speaker: Lae'zel
82.text: A pity for us both you've turned your back on me so often.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Be as snide as you want. I'm not interested in you like that.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: I am grateful for your aid. You are a gifted warrior.

71.speaker: Lae'zel
71.text: Vlaakith demands of me no less.

88.speaker: Lae'zel
88.text: If only you'd earned the right to lay at my side.
